oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1958-03-22 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from March 22, 1958. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Faron Young (host/performer), guest performers the Carlisles, and regular performers the Jordanaires, Rod Brasfield, Tommy Jackson, Chet Atkins, Minnie Pearl, and Del Wood. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 963rd broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Minnie Pearl; Carlisles; Del Wood; Faron Young; Jordanaires
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Faron Young introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Faron Young) -- Prince Albert jingle -- Faron Young introduces the Carlisles -- Oh, Boy! (Carlisles) -- Faron Young introduces Del Wood -- Down Yonder (Del Wood) -- Grant Turner and Faron Young announce his tour schedule -- Rosalie (Is Gonna Get Married) (Faron Young, Jordanaires) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Faron Young) -- Camel Cigarettes jingle -- Station announcements (Grant Turner)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Turner, Grant; Brasfield, Rod; Minnie Pearl; Atkins, Chet; Wood, Del; Jackson, Tommy; Jordanaires (Musical group); Young, Faron; Carlisles (Musical group); Carlisle, Bill
